overview:
Francisco José Martínez is a Spanish tech entrepreneur based in Barcelona. He has created four companies, (the first company in his first 20’s), INTERACTIVOS.NET a Digital Communication Agency. Co-founder in SAURION.com in 2009 a leading Mobile Commerce Platform in Spain.

He has participated in other online start-ups as a Business Angel and advisor, like Fever.

Contestant in The Apprentice 2009, in his first Spanish season.

He is currently Chief Operating Officer in Neodalia.com, a flash deals marketplace of design products focus in the Spanish market. He is based in Barcelona.
